content: Insurance Investments AMA Christopher Tan Asked by AnonymousAsked on 21 Jan 2019I saw that you are a speaker for the Seedly event in March? I bought tickets and was wondering what you will cover then and what I can do to prepare for your talk?Looking forward to hearing from you and the other speakers. thanks!1 answerAnswerBump0

Christopher Tan, Executive Director at MoneyOwl Private limitedLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 04 Feb 2019Hi anonymous, so sorry for the late reply. I will be covering on insurance planning. Specifically i will talk aboutHow long do you need inusrance coverageHow much you needWhat type of insurance is most suitable.You do not need to prepare for it, just come and enjoy the sessions! Hope to see you soon and thank you for coming!0 comments4
